item.title: #6 CISA, LastPass, Britain's Computer Misuse Act, and User Centered Security Practices for Local Government
item.description: ROP-E6: HTML5 Audio ^ Austin and Nathan chat about calls for new cybersecurity regulation in the United States, the LastPass debacle, Britain taking on an aging cybersecurity law, and user centered cybersecurity approaches for local governments.
